doc:
Darren E. Burrows https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Darren_E._Burrows 0 Darren E. Burrows (born September 12, 1966) is an American actor and director. He is best known for playing Ed Chigliak in the television series Northern Exposure. He also appeared in Cry-Baby, Amistad, Sunset Strip, Forty Shades of Blue, in a season six episode of The X-Files and in Season 9 (Episode 11) of CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (billed as Darren Burrows). Darren_E._Burrows ( born September_12_,_1966 ) is an_American_actor_and_director . He is_best_known for playing Ed_Chigliak in the_television_series_Northern_Exposure . He also appeared in Cry-Baby , Amistad , Sunset_Strip , Forty_Shades of Blue , in a_season_six_episode of The_X-Files and in Season_9_(_Episode_11_) of CSI : Crime_Scene_Investigation (_billed as Darren_Burrows_) .
